document_data.name: Chenraya Xorlarrin
document_data.mainbody: '''Chenraya Xorlarrin''' was a [[drow]] [[cleric|priestess]] of [[Lolth]] and a member of [[House Xorlarrin]] in [[Menzoberranzan]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies}}
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, the [[goddess]] Lolth ordered her minions to collect as many [[blueflame ghost|blue fire]] items and relics of [[Mystra (Midnight)|Mystra]] as possible{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|2765}} so that Lolth could become the new goddess of [[magic]].{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|3549}} Chenraya conspired with the [[oni mage]] [[Pashra]] to steal [[Akan√ªl]]'s entire supply of [[arambarium]] ore. Arambarium was an extremely powerful metal that magnified the effects of magic.{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|495}} Her plans were thwarted by the [[Deva (aasimar)|deva]] [[Demascus]].
